013package org.apache.juneau.dto.html5;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.HtmlFormat.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
018
019import java.net.*;
020import java.util.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.html.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
027
028/**
029 * Superclass for all HTML elements.
030 *
031 * <p>
032 * These are beans that when serialized using {@link HtmlSerializer} generate valid HTML5 elements.
033 *
034 * <ul class='seealso'>
035 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-dto.jd.Html5">Overview &gt; juneau-dto &gt; HTML5</a>
036
037 * </ul>
038 */
039@org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.Html(format=XML)
040@FluentSetters
041public abstract class HtmlElement {
042
043   private LinkedHashMap<String,Object> attrs;
044
045   /**
046    * The attributes of this element.
047    *
048    * @return The attributes of this element.
049    */
050   @Xml(format=ATTRS)
051   @Beanp("a")
052   public LinkedHashMap<String,Object> getAttrs() {
053      return attrs;
054   }
055
056   /**
057    * Sets the attributes for this element.
058    *
059    * @param attrs The new attributes for this element.
060    * @return This object.
061    */
062   @Beanp("a")
063   public HtmlElement setAttrs(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> attrs) {
064      if (attrs != null) {
065         attrs.entrySet().forEach(x -> {
066            String key = x.getKey();
067            if ("url".equals(key) || "href".equals(key) || key.endsWith("action"))
068               x.setValue(StringUtils.toURI(x.getValue()));
069         });
070      }
071      this.attrs = attrs;
072      return this;
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Adds an arbitrary attribute to this element.
077    *
078    * @param key The attribute name.
079    * @param val The attribute value.
080    * @return This object.
081    */
082   public HtmlElement attr(String key, Object val) {
083      if (attrs == null)
084         attrs = map();
085      if (val == null)
086         attrs.remove(key);
087      else {
088         if ("url".equals(key) || "href".equals(key) || key.endsWith("action"))
089            val = StringUtils.toURI(val);
090         attrs.put(key, val);
091      }
092      return this;
093   }
094
095   /**
096    * Adds an arbitrary URI attribute to this element.
097    *
098    * <p>
099    * Same as {@link #attr(String, Object)}, except if the value is a string that appears to be a URI
100    * (e.g. <js>"servlet:/xxx"</js>).
101    *
102    * <p>
103    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
104    * Strings must be valid URIs.
105    *
106    * <p>
107    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
108    *
109    * @param key The attribute name.
110    * @param val The attribute value.
111    * @return This object.
112    */
113   public HtmlElement attrUri(String key, Object val) {
114      if (attrs == null)
115         attrs = map();
116      attrs.put(key, StringUtils.toURI(val));
117      return this;
118   }
119
120   /**
121    * Returns the attribute with the specified name.
122    *
123    * @param key The attribute name.
124    * @return The attribute value, or <jk>null</jk> if the named attribute does not exist.
125    */
126   public String getAttr(String key) {
127      return getAttr(String.class, key);
128   }
129
130   /**
131    * Returns the attribute with the specified name converted to the specified class type.
132    *
133    * @param <T> The class type to convert this class to.
134    * @param type
135    *    The class type to convert this class to.
136    *    See {@link ConverterUtils} for a list of supported conversion types.
137    * @param key The attribute name.
138    * @return The attribute value, or <jk>null</jk> if the named attribute does not exist.
139    */
140   public <T> T getAttr(Class<T> type, String key) {
141      return attrs == null ? null : ConverterUtils.toType(attrs.get(key), type);
142   }
143
144   /**
145    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/editing.html#the-accesskey-attribute">accesskey</a>
146    * attribute.
147    *
148    * @param accesskey The new value for this attribute.
149    * @return This object.
150    */
151   @FluentSetter
152   public HtmlElement accesskey(String accesskey) {
153      attr("accesskey", accesskey);
154      return this;
155   }
156
157   /**
158    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#classes">class</a> attribute.
159    *
160    * @param _class The new value for this attribute.
161    * @return This object.
162    */
163   @FluentSetter
164   public HtmlElement _class(String _class) {
165      attr("class", _class);
166      return this;
167   }
168
169   /**
170    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/editing.html#attr-contenteditable">contenteditable</a>
171    * attribute.
172    *
173    * @param contenteditable The new value for this attribute.
174    * Typically a {@link Boolean} or {@link String}.
175    * @return This object.
176    */
177   @FluentSetter
178   public HtmlElement contenteditable(Object contenteditable) {
179      attr("contenteditable", contenteditable);
180      return this;
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#the-dir-attribute">dir</a> attribute.
185    *
186    * @param dir The new value for this attribute.
187    * @return This object.
188    */
189   @FluentSetter
190   public HtmlElement dir(String dir) {
191      attr("dir", dir);
192      return this;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/editing.html#the-hidden-attribute">hidden</a> attribute.
197    *
198    * @param hidden
199    *    The new value for this attribute.
200    *    Typically a {@link Boolean} or {@link String}.
201    * @return This object.
202    */
203   @FluentSetter
204   public HtmlElement hidden(Object hidden) {
205      attr("hidden", deminimize(hidden, "hidden"));
206      return this;
207   }
208
209   /**
210    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#the-id-attribute">id</a> attribute.

213    * @return This object.
214    */
215   @FluentSetter
216   public HtmlElement id(String id) {

218      return this;
219   }
220

227   @FluentSetter

230      return this;
231   }

899   /**
900    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/dom.html#attr-translate">translate</a> attribute.
901    *
902    * @param translate
903    *    The new value for this attribute.
904    *    Typically a {@link Number} or {@link String}.
905    * @return This object.
906    */
907   @FluentSetter
908   public HtmlElement translate(Object translate) {
909      attr("translate", translate);
910      return this;
911   }
912
913   /**
914    * If the specified attribute is a boolean, it gets converted to the attribute name if <jk>true</jk> or <jk>null</jk> if <jk>false</jk>.
915    *
916    * @param value The attribute value.
917    * @param attr The attribute name.
918    * @return The deminimized value, or the same value if the value wasn't a boolean.
919    */
920   protected Object deminimize(Object value, String attr) {
921      if (value instanceof Boolean) {
922         if ((Boolean)value)
923            return attr;
924         return null;
925      }
926      return value;
927   }
928
929   // <FluentSetters>
930
931   // </FluentSetters>
932
933   @Override /* Object */
934   public String toString() {
935      return HtmlSerializer.DEFAULT_SQ.toString(this);
936   }
937}
